message.body: YAYYYYYY Should I bring anything btw? And what about dressy clothes?
Yes yes yes yes yes! So excited! I can't think of anything really.. No dressy clothes needed, but maybe something with an elastic waistband would be helpful!
Sooooo close!!!! Not sure about official ETA but someone said we got to Pittsburgh late?
Just passing by Hartford and Manchester?
WTF megabus, don't abuse your privileges
I'm going to turn off my phone to make sure I have enough battery but I'll be in intermittent touch in-between. :)
Just got on the mass pike!
Okay, just let me know when you see the framingham signs on the pike if you can
Yea, I'll try. I'm on the left side of the aisle on the top so my view is limited...
Okay, so you're a little over an hour! I'll head over in a half hour
Okay lady, i'm here for you! I spoke to someone who's meeting someone on your bus and you are close!
Just meet me in the terminal!
